Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-MaterialDangerInfectious

Language: en

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityRisk where concept is-a INF

name: MaterialDangerInfectious
title: MaterialDangerInfectious
description: Material known to be infectious with human pathogenic microorganisms. Those who handle this material must take precautions for their protection.
